concept.title: oxy_unparsed-entity-uri() Function
concept.shortdesc: The oxy_unparsed-entity-uri() function returns the URI value of an unparsed entity name.

dlentry.dd: The name of an unparsed entity defined in the DTD.

conbody.p: This function can be useful to display images that are referenced with unparsed entity names.

example.title: CSS for displaying the image in Author for an imagedata with entityref to an unparsed entity
